/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
